item.title: Rumble’s Deal With Perplexity Spurs Over 400% Surge In Retail Investor Chatter On Stocktwits
item.description: The stock saw a 421% increase in user message count in 24 hours after announcing a partnership with AI startup Perplexity.

item.title: UnitedHealth Shareholder Proposes Distinct Chairman And Chief Executive Roles: Report
item.description: Stephen Hemsley currently serves as both CEO and Chairman of the Board.

item.title: Tesla Gets A Price Target Hike From JPMorgan After Q3 Deliveries Beat Estimates
item.description: The new price target from JPMorgan implies a potential downside of about 66% from the stock’s closing price on Thursday.
